decks.notes: The deck focuses on utilizing Underworld Breach to repeatedly cast spells from the graveyard, fueling the combo with cards like Emry, Lurker of the Loch and Mishra's Bauble. By milling through the deck quickly with Grinding Station and other artifacts, the player can set up a win condition with Thassa's Oracle or by assembling a lethal board state using Urza's Saga. The deck is designed to be fast-paced and efficient, aiming to overwhelm opponents with a powerful combo finish.

This deck focuses on using control elements and ramping up mana to quickly bring out powerful Eldrazi creatures like Emrakul, the Promised End and World Breaker. It utilizes cards like Ugin's Labyrinth and Malevolent Rumble to control the board while also using Talisman of Impulse and Utopia Sprawl to ramp up mana production. Karn, the Great Creator can be used to fetch powerful artifacts like Kozilek's Return for board wipes. The combination of control elements and Eldrazi threats creates a strong and versatile deck that can quickly overwhelm opponents.

The main focus of this deck is to control the pace of the game by utilizing a combination of counterspells, hand disruption, and removal spells. The deck aims to disrupt the opponent's game plan while also presenting threats in the form of Murktide Regent and Psychic Frog. By efficiently managing resources and disrupting the opponent's plays, the deck aims to out-value the opponent and ultimately take control of the game. Additionally, the deck includes graveyard interaction with Unearth and Thought Scour to further enhance its control capabilities.

The deck focuses on controlling the game through counterspells, board wipes, and card advantage, while utilizing Wilderness Reclamation to generate additional mana and activate powerful instant-speed spells. Kaheera, the Orphanguard serves as a companion to provide additional synergy with creature cards. With a mix of sturdy threats like Solitude and versatile spells like Cryptic Command, the deck aims to outlast opponents and win through incremental advantage and powerful finishers like March of Otherworldly Light and Nexus of Fate. The mana base is carefully constructed to support the deck's color requirements and maximize efficiency.

The deck aims to quickly generate mana with cards like Ruby Medallion, Desperate Ritual, and Manamorphose to cast spells like Ral, Monsoon Mage and Grapeshot to deal damage to the opponent. It utilizes cards like Past in Flames and Wish to recur spells from the graveyard and search for key components of the combo. The deck also includes Valakut Awakening and Raucous Theater for card selection and potential card advantage. Overall, the strategy revolves around efficiently casting spells and chaining them together to create a powerful combo finish.

This deck aims to quickly assemble the combo of Basking Broodscale and Blade of the Bloodchief to create a powerful creature that can quickly dominate the battlefield. It relies on cards like Mishra's Bauble and Ancient Stirrings to find key pieces, while utilizing support cards like Kozilek's Command and Malevolent Rumble to control the board. The inclusion of Eldrazi creatures and Eldrazi Temple provide additional threats and ramp capabilities. The deck also includes disruption elements like Spellskite and Boseiju, Who Endures to protect the combo and ensure its success.

This deck focuses on quickly filling the graveyard with powerful creatures like Emrakul and Ulamog, then bringing them back into play with cards like Goryo's Vengeance and Through the Breach to overwhelm the opponent with a game-winning combo. The deck also utilizes cards like Devourer of Destiny and Kozilek's Command to disrupt the opponent's strategy and create opportunities for a quick victory. Its strategy revolves around utilizing instant reanimation spells to cheat huge creatures into play and seal the game before the opponent has a chance to react.
